amendment.description: Amendment increases funding to the Land and Water Conservation Fund by $20 million offset by a reduction in funding for the Department of Interior salaries and expenses by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase land acquisition accounts of BLM by $1 million, FWS by $4 million , NPS by $4 million, and FS by $4 million, offset by the Office of the Secretary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bass (NH) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
